p.b: Which sentence uses the compound word earthenware correctly?

simpleChoice.p: The ground shook during the earthenware.
We ate a simple meal served on earthenware plates.
The astronaut took an earthenware photo through the ship's window.
His computer could not run the school's new earthenware program.
